title: BreakBeatMega
description: 44 incredible tracks from the master of broken rhythm - Devil Dragon Tatoo, releases of which have repeatedly been on the top 100 on Beatport.
longDescription:
Prewiev: https://youtu.be/mj-ozoQCh-0


44 incredible tracks from the master of broken rhythm - Devil Dragon Tatoo, releases of which have repeatedly been on the top 100 on Beatport.

This tracks will bring a fire on your project, will give him an incredible drive and power. Almost 4 hours of music in high quality, over two gigabytes of breakbeat, big bit, dubstep and electro punk.
